snippet: Julie Taymor filed court papers with damaging e-mails in the lawsuit against the producers of “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark.”
abstract: Julie Taymor, who is suing the producers of musical Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark after being fired as creative director in March 2011, files court papers that disclose trove of private e-mails among the show's principals; new legal papers put Taymor's famous collaborators on notice that they could face more potentially embarrassing revelations that might tarnish their public images if case goes to trial.
lead_paragraph: Julie Taymor filed court papers with damaging e-mails in the lawsuit against the producers of “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark.”

headline.main: Court Papers in ‘Spider-Man’ Suit Could Tarnish Reputations
headline.print_headline: Court Papers in ‘Spider-Man’ Suit Could Tarnish Reputations
